website_summaries.verdict: Good-quality inline skates that adjust sizes.
pros: Work nicely both indoors and outdoors
Boots glide easily from one size to the next
cons: Model only comes with one brake for the dominant foot

customer_reviews.title: Both plastic tongues after a couple dozen uses (*edit - happened again in only a month of use)
customer_reviews.text: Bought 10 months ago - but used only during summer in 2019. My daughter loved them until these broken tongues rip into her feet and cause great discomfort. She refuses to wear them anymore. One of them was broken after about 10 uses. Did we do something wrong? Shouldn't they last longer? *edit - Amazon was kind enough to send another. And guess what? After a month of use (maybe 10 times?) - broke in the same spot again
customer_reviews.author: diegoboy

customer_reviews.title: Really smooth ride though- great wheels. Purchased another brand for my daughter and ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits well for a ten year old girl w/ size 5 shoes, but a little smaller than expected. Really smooth ride though- great wheels. Purchased another brand for my daughter and she thought it was too "bumpy," so I tried these, and she loved them so much, we bought another pair as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: After 2.5 years they are still great!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has worn these for over 2.5 years now. Well worth the money. I only wish I would have bought them sooner as she loves to skate in them! We are close to maxing out on size. But she was 7 when she got them and will turn 10 in a few weeks, so they have lasted a few growth suprts. I will be buying a pair for my son very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly and Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great skates
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 8 year old daughter who had grown frustrated with her 'little kid' adjustable skates. These are built well and use good quality bearings and wheels, and the adjustable sizing makes them worth buying for feet that are still growing rapidly. She's loves how quiet and smooth they are, and the straps can be easily adjusted to fit her feet well.
customer_reviews.author: mark patel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality Adjustable Skate
customer_reviews.text: These are much better quality than I anticipate for adjustable skates. They are sturdy and well constructed. The size adjustment is easy to use and glides easily from one size to the next. There is a little bar, so you can see which size you are at. The liner is two separate pieces so the toe portion slides over the heel portion as you adjust it. The laces are easy to snug up and there is a loop at the end to attach to an elastic band, so the ends don't dangle and get caught in the wheels. The ankle strap adjusts easily.
customer_reviews.author: VTMomma

customer_reviews.title: Great skates!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd pair. These are great skates!! They are easy for my daughter to put them on and off. She has had them for about 2 years. Her bf came over and fell in love with them so I bought her a pair for her birthday. These are great and affordable. Now her younger sister wears the.
customer_reviews.author: melissa edri

customer_reviews.title: Grow With Your Child
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has had these roller blades for about 1 year, and they were a great choice. Already we've had to go up a size and these easily slide into the next size up. I anticipate they will easily last until she grows out of them in another year or so. The wheels are smooth on both indoor and outdoor surfaces, easily adjust around the ankle. The one issue I have with them is that the laces are so long that we've had to get creative about wrapping them around the ankle strap so she won't trip over them.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Bourgeois

customer_reviews.title: Working, but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: The kids love them, but having bought two pair for six year old twins both sets had broken rivets or the rivet pulled out of the plastic after the first use. I was able to mock the lace around other parts, but super cheaply made. I think they will last "long enough" so I didn't return them. Again, fun but don't expect them to last very long.
customer_reviews.author: wood

customer_reviews.title: Fit nicely, good quality.
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old wanted to learn how to skate, so we bought her these roller blades. The sizes are adjustable and range from size 12-2. My daughter wears a size 11.5 and these skates fit her well when adjusted to the smallest setting. They are easy to put on and her feet are well secured while skating. They seem very durable and may daughter says they are comfortable. I love the color combination and the fact that these skates will grow with my child.
customer_reviews.author: Sinini

customer_reviews.title: Great set of skates.  Variable size is a plus!
customer_reviews.text: Functionally, these are perfect. Grows with the person wearing them so you don't have to keep buying new ones. The wheel bearings are nice and smooth and not too fast for my 7 year old daughter learning how to skate, but not restrictive now that's she's getting better and faster. Love the touch of girly design, but doesn't overdo it. My daughter and I both highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Navy Doc

customer_reviews.title: My little girl didn't want to take these off!
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my little girl! She absolutely loves them! She loves that she can address them as her feet grow! I think she's on these things for several hours every single week! When we first got him she didn't want to take them off! I would definitely recommend these to anyone looking to get skates for their kids!
customer_reviews.author: TJ

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: These skates are perfect for my daughter, who wears a size 11. She finally graduated from those baby adjustable skates, because her feet grew enough for real rollerblades. Hahaha. They are very comfortable for her, and she is able to put them on and take them off herself quite easily. (She is 7.) They seem to be very durable and should last her for a couple of years, at least. I'm so glad we found these!
customer_reviews.author: momnteacher

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These are great!! My daughter loves them! High quality and they grow with her!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Davis

customer_reviews.title: but she will grow into them easily. As far as comfort
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves to skate. Theses came a little bigger than we thought, but she will grow into them easily. As far as comfort, my daughter has had little complaint of pinching or being too tight/loose. That's a big deal when you are working with 5 year old. She loves them and uses them almost everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Stubbs

customer_reviews.title: These are a hit!
customer_reviews.text: These were a birthday gift to my nine-year-old daughter. She was so surprised and happy to get them My daughter learned to rollerblade quickly with these. She goes up and down the sidewalk happily. The skates have a fun design and keep her foot supported well inside of the skate. It is also a plus that they are adjustable and will last awhile. Wearing longer socks with these helps with comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Figment

customer_reviews.title: Have had to wash the inserts once and that was easy as well
customer_reviews.text: We haven't had any issues with these rollerblades. Showed my daughter (6 yo) how to use them once and she is able to get in and out of them by herself multiple times a day. Have had to wash the inserts once and that was easy as well. Adjustability works great so far, we've only had to move it once though. They've provided endless hours of fun for a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.author: Robert P. Anderson II

customer_reviews.title: false advertising by Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughters 9th birthday. One buying option from Amazon offered them "USED" for less than the other prices but stated clearly that they were NEW just the box was damaged. The box was fine- the rollerblades themselves had lace rivets that fell out. The rollerblades were defective. False advertising. Extremely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Brooke S. Kemmerer

customer_reviews.title: Love them. Best quality !! Must have !!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love them!!! My daughter who is 6 she just started to roller blade, she’s like a pro now. Love how sturdy and lovely they look. Great quality also! Definitely will purchase again for all family from this brand
customer_reviews.author: tatiana

customer_reviews.title: Good support for beginners
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for grand kid that is difficult in the balance area. The skates were great. No wobbly legs and they are very easy to learn to use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Other then that they are really nice quality and can’t wait to see her face
customer_reviews.text: Was very excited to get these for my daughter!! It was kind of a really special gift! I paid to have a new set and although it came earlier then expected I am upset that it came opened and was a used set! I paid for a new set and I don’t have to return it! I cleaned them up and put them back in the box with hopes there is nothing wrong with them! Other then that they are really nice quality and can’t wait to see her face!!
customer_reviews.author: holly Murray

customer_reviews.title: Great roller blades for 6 year old
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old daughter wanted to play roller hockey with her big brother so bad. She asked for roller blades, but I had a hard time finding them in size 12 kids in the store. So glad I found these. She can put them on herself and seems very comfortable skating in them.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Moon

customer_reviews.title: Great first pair
customer_reviews.text: These are really nice skates. Love the bright colors and adjustable fit. My daughter said they are comfortable. I think these are the perfect first pair of roller blades.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Good value roller blades for the price
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 8 year old daughter who is learning how to roller blade. They were stiff out of the box, but are breaking in as she uses them more. True to size. Overall- good value for the cost for a starter set.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Cara

customer_reviews.title: Great skates for the price!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these. Since she got them she has been skating all the time. She loves the fact that they don't have laces (and so do I!) and they are really easy to adjust. I love that the inner shoe comes out to wash. They do have a lace across the front that is meant to allow the skate to adjust to size 5. For now, the lace is a little annoying and pops off, but I don't think it's a problem because it's too short to get caught in the wheels. Great deal for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra R.

customer_reviews.title: Great youth skates
customer_reviews.text: My 8 years old girls love these. They fit perfectly and are adjustable to give them 2-3 years skating hopefully. No sore or "hot spots" when using them. Wheels are holding up well so far and still turning freely without any sticking. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Wolfpacker98

customer_reviews.title: Decent first skate
customer_reviews.text: Decent first skate. Looks reliable and sturdy, and will have room to grow. Also, the adjuster is cake. Super easy; push a button and slide it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Lubbz

customer_reviews.title: My daughter likes these
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my daughter as a Christmas present. She loves them. They are pretty easy to pull on and snap closed. Sturdy and durable. And the design and colors are so awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Vera Stepenski

customer_reviews.title: Quality is not good
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my kid, cloth got ripped off very soon.
customer_reviews.author: mavericks

customer_reviews.title: Great Rollerblades! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Great rollerblades. They are well made and my daughter got so much use out of them... using them almost daily. We will now give them to our neighbor's kid. They are very well made. They show little wear with lots of use. I will look to buy these again in a larger size. They are kid friendly and easy to put on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Aniusia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: These are my daughters favorite Christmas gift this year! Great fit, smooth glide and easy for her to put on and off.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Becker

customer_reviews.title: These are great roller blades
customer_reviews.text: These are great roller blades. We ordered them for our 8 year-old daughter. She can put them on by herself and is learning to roller blade. Because she has been growing like crazy recently we like the feature that they are adjustable in size.
customer_reviews.author: Tenzin

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter loved this, she practiced every day and now she just skated down the street with no problem
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Great value for the money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on. Runs pretty smooth. My 7 year old girl loves it! The only thing could be improved is that it's a bit heavy. She gets tired quickly with them on.
customer_reviews.author: P

customer_reviews.title: Rolls smoothly
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my daughter, hours of fun. She was able to get use to it in a few hours and balances well!
customer_reviews.author: Tools. Electro. DIY

customer_reviews.title: I was skeptical- but these are awesome!
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price! The wheels are soft and smooth- not like the plastic ones where you can feel every crack in the road. They also grow with your child! Awesome product!
customer_reviews.author: letitbe

customer_reviews.title: Poorly Packaged
customer_reviews.text: This item came and had clearly been opened before, with the zip ties all cut open, the box all bent out of shape, and no one took the time even to repackage it so it looks like a new item. The quality of the item appears average, and I’m contemplating whether or not to keep it, so the packaging seems to represent the item’s quality.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Monroe

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my 7 year old. My 9 years old can were it too. Would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: h.a.h

customer_reviews.title: Arrived Dirty and Used
customer_reviews.text: The skates are cute however arrived used looking and dirty. As far as functionality I don't doubt the will be just fine however they get a zero for presentation of the product.
customer_reviews.author: thevanwinkles

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic skates!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic skates!! My 10 year old daughter wanted inline skates for Christmas. With kids growing feet, the adjustable feature is fabulous! Very sturdy and well made. She loves them! Would buy them Again in a heartbeat!
customer_reviews.author: Mommy2girlz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These fit my 7 year old very well on the smallest setting, she usually wears a size one.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Lisa Griffith

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: My girls have loved these roller blades! The quality is great! I bought them the size medium (2-5). One of my daughters wears a size 1 and they work fine for her. I wear a size 7 and can wear them when adjusted to the biggest size, but my toes do barely touch the end.
customer_reviews.author: CC

customer_reviews.title: Great pair for kids
customer_reviews.text: Daughter loves it. Bought another pair for my other daughter who know loves it too.
customer_reviews.author: Chad V/Vanessa V

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what it gets her rolling along!
customer_reviews.text: Eye-catching appearance, decent build, convenient sizing options. My 7 yo daughter is happy about these skates and they seem to be comfortable enough for her to start rolling from level 0. Looking to get another pair for my 5 yo.
customer_reviews.author: Elena S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to learn adjustable roller skate.
customer_reviews.text: Foot size adjustable, easy to use fancy looking roller skate. My daughter is loving it, she learned and now comfortably roller skating.
customer_reviews.author: G-man

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Best roller blades for the money! Size is true to advertised and my 10yr old twins love them. Durable and Easy to use!!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: plastic base
customer_reviews.text: easy on 7 year old likes them. Plastic base does not seem as sturdy as the aluminum but only time will tell. Does not get very tight on her foot but she seems OK with it.
customer_reviews.author: E98045

customer_reviews.title: Loose adjustment strap
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, quick shipping and 6 year old loves it! Unfortunately the adjustment strap comes unhooked after about 5 minutes. Very irritating. Everything else is functional and seems comfortable. For those suffering similar strap problems, I bought a pack of these. ENVISIONED Reusable Cinch Straps 1"x12" - 12 Pack Hook and Loop - Plus 2 Free Bonus Reusable Cable Ties  . Tie two together and run through the rear loop. Works great!
customer_reviews.author: Michael J Troutman

customer_reviews.title: Worse stitch and not safe
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the quality, I better bought the /$50 dollar worth but in good Quality than paying the 34 dollar plus shipping fee,it’s like worthless sorry.. the stitch ate worse and my Kids only use 2x and now I have to keep in the storage room.. but thanks anyway oo
customer_reviews.author: Lorenzo

customer_reviews.title: Good gift for my daughter
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves them. She used to have a pair of roller shoes, wearing almost every day! Now she wear this pair instead!
customer_reviews.author: shiny

customer_reviews.title: Great skates!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter LOVES these! We bought the larger size so she could grow into them. They are well made and look so cute and not as bulky as most I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Amy S.

customer_reviews.title: Roller Derby Stinger 5.2 Adjustable inline Stakes
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair of the Roller Blades for my 7 year old granddaughter in Australia. She has put them to the test! They are well made and function well. All of her reports, photographs and videos of her using them are positive.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald F.

customer_reviews.title: Great skates...Love these!
customer_reviews.text: Love these! Great product! Shipped & arrived as expected. Very happy with purchase. Would highly recommend these to others and would def buy again when need be!
customer_reviews.author: T. Tamberelli

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great skates. Adjustments are sweet as my daughters feet grow fast.
customer_reviews.author: loki

customer_reviews.title: She is size 3 and they fit just fine.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these skates. She is size 3 and they fit just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Cheri

customer_reviews.title: Great rollerblades!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these 3 years ago when my daughter was 7, and these still have room to expand and are really durable!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie E. Ducourant

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: These are so great! And the adjustable feature is so so nice. My daughter loves them and I love that they will last for 3 more sizes!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves these roller blades. They seem to ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these roller blades. They seem to be less bulky than other brands. Everything is adjustable to make a snug fit around the foot and ankle and construction is quality!
customer_reviews.author: Nannette

customer_reviews.title: Run true to size
customer_reviews.text: I got my 9yo a large for size 4.5 shoe. Fit perfectly and she loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amel

customer_reviews.title: Great skate!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit with my daughter. Love the quality, the colors and the price!
customer_reviews.author: Klumb

customer_reviews.title: Way to Go for Young Skaters!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent purchase for 6 1/2 year old granddaughter! She has used these on smooth surfaces outside and in our local indoor skating arena. They are easy on and off and pair well with the knee and elbow pads for those who are just learning or anyone who wants to roller blade on rougher surfaces, like sidewalks, etc.etc.
customer_reviews.author: FL

customer_reviews.title: Fit all my daughter need
customer_reviews.text: She like it so much. she's been using for some months and it show very durability and good performance.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla J

customer_reviews.title: The wheel has good quality. The inner shoe is soft
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift for my 9 years old daughter and it is a big hit. She loves to skate with it a lot. The wheel has good quality. The inner shoe is soft. The Adjustable shoe fits her feet very well and it will last for a few more years. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Wes D.

customer_reviews.title: Love skates
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for 8yo. She loves these and has already worn out the brakes. I love how they can expand to their growth since they grow up so fast!
customer_reviews.author: L. Groh

customer_reviews.title: Perfect b-day gift for a 9 year old
customer_reviews.text: Perfect b-day gift for a 9 year old. She loves these and plays in them every single day. They are sturdy and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Karri

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great! no problems! easy to put on and lots of fun! great!
customer_reviews.author: John H

customer_reviews.title: #soexcited
customer_reviews.text: Daughter was so excited to receive a pair of roller blades, she not expecting to get two pairs of skates for her birthday! She loves that she can use them outside, having a great time!!!!!!! :)
customer_reviews.author: Christie Flores

customer_reviews.title: Nice skates for growing daughter
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality skates that adjust so they last your child more years. I would prefer regular tie shoelaces, but the type it has is fine. The wheels are not super fast, which is nice for my daughter to learn.
customer_reviews.author: Carl1234

customer_reviews.title: Great entry level skates
customer_reviews.text: These were much better quality than I expected given the price point. My 10 year old daughter wore these every day for weeks and has loved them ever since.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Long

customer_reviews.title: Being adjustable really made these a hit for learning. ...
customer_reviews.text: Being adjustable really made these a hit for learning. Except that they roll all around the house in winter. Wait till Spring to make this purchase. LOL
customer_reviews.author: Ed Holliday

customer_reviews.title: Poor material
customer_reviews.text: Bought daughter and she loved them until after 3 x months they started cracking. Attempted to contact company regarding and absolutely NO attention from this companies customer service. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: David Dietz

customer_reviews.title: Win, Win
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these and uses them daily! She is 9 and still has room for growth.
customer_reviews.author: EasttoWest00

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: These skates are much more than I expected! They are so cute and as your kid grows u expand the skates to their shoe size with one easy click, love them and so does my little girl!
customer_reviews.author: AndyBlair

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old is in love with these inline skates!! She has small feet, and I'm anticipating a growth spurt any time now, so we were thrilled that this will start at her current size 2 and grow with her for a couple years.
customer_reviews.author: Jifinifer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter recieved this as a Christmas gift last year ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter recieved this as a Christmas gift last year and still years these to skate around the house almost every day. She loves to go to the skating rink with these too!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda T.

customer_reviews.title: Almost like the "teeth" on the strap are stripped or not ...
customer_reviews.text: White binding/strap across top always slides back out after I tighten it for my daughter. Almost like the "teeth" on the strap are stripped or not long enough.
customer_reviews.author: A. Schepers

customer_reviews.title: ... wears a size 12 toddler but these fit just fine and she will have plenty of room to grow
customer_reviews.text: My daughter wears a size 12 toddler but these fit just fine and she will have plenty of room to grow! I love that they adjust!
customer_reviews.author: Jilian Helmey

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: My five-year old daughter loves these! They are cute and very high quality. They roll easily. This is our family's second pair of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: SATM

customer_reviews.title: Very nice pair of roller blades for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice pair of roller blades for the price. They adjust to three sizes, therefore, as long as people take care of them, they should last at least 3 years. My niece loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great skates for the price
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for several kids ages 8-12. Great product for the price. Smooth rolling wheels, and have held up well so far for an entire summer of daily use.
customer_reviews.author: J. Miner

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves them!
customer_reviews.text: Got the mediums for my 8 year old. She is size 1 in normal shoes. They fit great with room to grow. Did i mention they look cool too!
customer_reviews.author: Tony.A

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: 5 year old is loving these, have had for 3 months, holding up well.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great rollerblades!
customer_reviews.text: These work really well for my daughter, she loves them! I like that they are adjustable, however we haven't had to adjust them bigger yet.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Girl

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was wanting good pair of starter rollerblades.... Just what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: J W

customer_reviews.title: Good skates
customer_reviews.text: Daughter has used these for several months (1x week). My daughter would recommend these to a friend. Fully adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Supa Dupa Pupa Scupa

customer_reviews.title: Great skates. My daughter wears them all day - ...
customer_reviews.text: Great skates. My daughter wears them all day - inside and out!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Mart

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute!
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my 8 year old niece & she loves them. They are perfect as she can grow with them as they are adjustable. She also thinks they are very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Monica Vickers

customer_reviews.title: The lace up and buckle design provides an easy snug system for a youth to put them on ...
customer_reviews.text: Skates offer smooth rolling wheels. The lace up and buckle design provides an easy snug system for a youth to put them on without help. True fit to description.
customer_reviews.author: Calley

customer_reviews.title: Easy to adjust and has a wide range of adjustment
customer_reviews.text: Fits my 9 year olds size 3 feet. Easy to adjust and has a wide range of adjustment. Should last a few years as my daughter grows. So far they function as you would expect a pair of Rollerblade to. Lots of padding and seem comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: They are sturdy and my daughter loves them
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous about purchasing skates online, but I am very proud of the quality. They are sturdy and my daughter loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... old loves these and the ability to adjust is great. The wheel size is perfect for speed on ...
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old loves these and the ability to adjust is great. The wheel size is perfect for speed on the roll and they're not getting as knicked up as other products.
customer_reviews.author: M. King

customer_reviews.title: Good value and quality
customer_reviews.text: Good value! Bought a pair for each of our girls and they love them. Probably have skated with them for 15 hours already and no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Glahn

customer_reviews.title: 7 year old loves it.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this as a gift for my 7 year old. It was delivered as promised in perfect condition. She loves them and we were able to easily adjust the size to her feet.
customer_reviews.author: Trina Hubert

customer_reviews.title: Small
customer_reviews.text: Runs small. My daughter is a size 1 and these are too small. I bought the size small which is supposed to be size 12-2
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Plenty-o-fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids really enjoy these. They can do them up themselves (6 and 8). Easy to adjust. I bought one pair and had to buy another.
customer_reviews.author: TOTR

customer_reviews.title: Roller skates
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 7 year old she is happy to skate quite comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.author: Khyati

customer_reviews.title: They said they fit up to a 5, they ...
customer_reviews.text: They said they fit up to a 5, they will only fit up to a size 4! Otherwise these are so cute!!!
customer_reviews.author: *J*

customer_reviews.title: 8 year olds love it !
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 8 year old daughter and she absolutely loves them. This is the first time she is learning how to skate and these skates are definitely her best friend now!
customer_reviews.author: Aims09

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 8 year old daughter. Size 4-5 foot. Fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Dizz

customer_reviews.title: Cute; ok for most part
customer_reviews.text: They are cute and ok for the most part. One skate doesn't seem to want to tighten at the top but for the price, I received what I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Jones205

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: great roller blades, the only negative is the brake doesn't really brake...
customer_reviews.author: byi

product_meta.title: Roller Derby Girl's Stinger 5.2 Adjustable Inline Skate
product_meta.description: Get caught up with the Stinger 5.2 Girls Inline. This skate is designed with a pull and tighten lace system and adjustable sizing that makes it easy for your young child that is on the go. Roller Derby Skate Corp has been the leader in producing skate products for over 80 years. We are America's Skate Company. Our skates are designed to perform as well as they look. See our general and sizing information at www.rollerderby.com.
feature_bullets: Molded cuff for Support & easy skating with EZ Push Button adjustment system and comfort fit washable liner
Adjustable sizing: Small fits shoe sizes 12-2 and Medium fits shoe sizes 2-5
